p: Philosophical Debates: Engage in deep philosophical discussions. But beware, it might ask you to ponder your existence in return. Mood Lighting: It adjusts room lighting based on its perceived “mood.” If it’s feeling “blue,” expect a cool, calming ambiance. Emotional Support Mode: Activated by saying, “I need a friend.” It will then offer affirmations, though often laced with a hint of sarcasm: “You’re doing great, sweetie. Really, you are.”
